meanings.definition: The act of forming or constructing a groin.
meanings.sent1: The groining of the arches was done carefully by the builders.
meanings.sent2: The groining of the walls added strength to the structure.
meanings.sent3: The groining of the garden path made it look like a mini bridge.
meanings.sent4: The groining of the tree branches created a natural canopy above.
meanings.sent5: The groining of the fence posts made them more stable in the ground.

meanings.definition: A series of groins forming a vaulted ceiling.
meanings.sent1: The elegant groining in the cathedral's ceiling was admired by all.
meanings.sent2: The groining in the old castle's hall gave it a majestic look.
meanings.sent3: The groining in the attic made it feel like a secret hideaway.
meanings.sent4: The groining in the tunnel roof resembled the ribs of a giant creature.
meanings.sent5: The groining in the cellar ceiling created interesting patterns of light and shadow.

meanings.sent1: The groining of the two vaults created a unique architectural feature.
meanings.sent2: The groining of the church's arches was a marvel of craftsmanship.
meanings.sent3: The groining of the tunnels made them look like they were embracing each other.
meanings.sent4: The groining of the passageway gave it a sense of grandeur.
meanings.sent5: The groining of the room's ceiling added a touch of elegance to the space.
